Comments: Taken for anxiety related to dental work. Taken the night before it allowed me to get to sleep. I normally would have been unable to sleep. The same amount was taken One hr before my visit and helped me deal with my anxiety greatly.

Side Effects: Nausea_ dry mouth and tiredness loss of appetite and slight euphoria
Comments: I only wish the doctor would have let me stay on it because its so strong and you do not need as much to get the same effects you would on a basic benzo_ say Valium or serepaxclonazepam and lorazepam are good_ but triazolam is stronger
Really helps with acne - be patient_ this stuff is terrific_ much better than unbuffered bp.
